title: Hello!
body: The recent May the 4th reminded me just how much Star Wars means to me. I’m a big fan of many other fandoms for sure, and I dunno thought it might be nice to try and get back into Tumblr for all those fandom goodies. This blog will have a ton of Star Wars on it, but also Harry Potter, Lord of the Rings, Hobbit, Tv Shows, Marvel, maybe a dash of DC etc. If that’s cool with you drop me a follow :) May the force be with you!

reblog.comment: The recent May the 4th reminded me just how much Star Wars means to me. blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: When I was six years old I broke my leg I was running from my brother and his friends And tasted the sweet perfume of the...
caption:
When I was six years old I broke my leg
I was running from my brother and his friends
And tasted the sweet perfume of the mountain grass I rolled down
I was younger then, take me back to when I
Found my heart and broke it here
Made friends and lost them through the years
And I’ve not seen the roaring fields in so long, I know I’ve grown
But I can’t wait to go home

Ed Sheeran - Castle on the Hill

summary:
Ben: Ok, could be worse.
Rowan: How? How could this be worse?
Ben: Well, you could accidentally get your head caught in a...
body:
Ben: Ok, could be worse.

Rowan: How? How could this be worse?

Ben: Well, you could accidentally get your head caught in a helicopter door that flies you out over the ocean, where it drops you straight into a pod of ravenous orca that rip you apart, leaving nothing but your bones for the hungry crabs in the inky depths at the bottom of the ocean!

Rowan: But it’s cursed vaults, there is no…

MC: Or we could killed by ice knight, or something like this stones could kill us, or this dark wizard could kill us right now, but we are playing comedy here, so he’s waiting, when we ended this joke, or probably professor Dumbledore, who is waiting right there, when I’ll end my line too, could take from us housepoints, and Felix’ll be mad.

Ben: Or Acromantula could eat us alive.

MC: Oh, it’s here too?

Ben: No, I just thinking, what could be worse, then Rakepick’s dead body.

Rowan: That is why no one want to be our friend.

summary: Everything OK, Skittles? only asking because you re-blogged 'due to personal reasons I’ll be in my bedroom making no noise and...
question: Everything OK, Skittles? only asking because you re-blogged 'due to personal reasons I’ll be in my bedroom making no noise and pretending that I don’t exist'
answer:
Everything good. It’s just same. A lot of times I’d rather be in my room, with my music, cats and watching stuff. It also made me laugh out loud since I read it in his voice.

Thanks though. So yeah I’m all good.

reblog.comment:
Everything good. It’s just same. A lot of times I’d rather be in my room, with my music, cats and watching stuff. It also made me laugh out loud since I read it in his voice.

Thanks though. So yeah I’m all good.

trail.content_raw:
Everything good. It’s just same. A lot of times I’d rather be in my room, with my music, cats and watching stuff. It also made me laugh out loud since I read it in his voice.

Thanks though. So yeah I’m all good.
trail.content:
Everything good. It’s just same. A lot of times I’d rather be in my room, with my music, cats and watching stuff. It also made me laugh out loud since I read it in his voice.

Thanks though. So yeah I’m all good.

blog.name: phoinikopteros
blog.title: Armonia e Caos
blog.description:
Sono sempre stata un fenicottero, goffa nella voce, elegante nel volo. Sono nata dal nido fatto della cenere di chi mi ha preceduto. Le mie ali non sono forti abbastanza da reggere voli alti, ma percorro migliaia di chilometri a bassa quota senza riposare. Il mio piumaggio cambia colore a seconda del cibo che mi nutre: mi sbiadisco oppure splendo. Muoio molte volte in una sola vita, trasformo le mie ceneri in carne e piume colorate, ma conservo sempre un po' di quella morte dentro di me: quelle dodici piume nere di paura in ogni ala. Vengo dal buio, migro verso la luce. Io vedo così lontano, ma non vedo me stessa. Posso reggermi su una sola gamba, sono indipendente, mentre con l'altra mi proteggo dal grande freddo. Se ti amo ti riconoscerò tra la massa, abbasserò le mie difese, ti osserverò, ti abbraccerò, volerò verso di te, danzerò per te, morirò e rinascerò per te. ○
Io vivo nell'acqua. ○
Infj//Corvonero// LGBTQ+♥//MEXICO//Libri//Doctor Who//Merlino//Trono di Spade//Harry Potter//FullMetal Alchemist//Mezzosangue//Virginia Woolf♥ Scrivetemi se volete parlare.

trail.content_raw: “Afferra il mio braccio, Harry.”
trail.content: “Afferra il mio braccio, Harry.”

summary:
Harry: I'm dating-
Ron: No the ferret, please, no the ferret
Harry: the ferret
Draco: WHAT??
Harry: DRACO! I'M DATING...
body:
Harry: I'm dating-
Ron: No the ferret, please, no the ferret
Harry: the ferret
Draco: WHAT??
Harry: DRACO! I'M DATING DRACO!
Draco: You WERE dating Draco
Harry: Look at what you did!
Ron: I regret nothing, but also, you did it all by yourself

dialogue.name: Ron
dialogue.label: Ron:
dialogue.phrase: No the ferret, please, no the ferret

dialogue.name: Ron
dialogue.label: Ron:
dialogue.phrase: I regret nothing, but also, you did it all by yourself

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2028. After an incendiary article from Rita Skeeter reporting an increase in squib births, the wizarding world is tossed into chaos concerning the loss of magical heritage. The renegades vow to protect what’s left of magical blood without caring about the damage along the way. More and more wixen go missing, including the Weasleys’ own Dominique. The Ministry fights within itself as Percy Weasley and Hermione Granger battle for the position of Minister of Magic, tearing the fabric holding wizarding society together.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

Our roleplay currently has many canon characters available, such as Victoire Weasley, Freddie Weasley, Louis Weasley, Scorpius Malfoy, and both Scamander twins. We also welcome original characters, with lots of surnames available from canon!

FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: infinitetrooper
blog.title: Saintly Magic
blog.description: Musings on reading each chapter of Harry Potter as a sacred text

summary: The Midnight Duel through Betrayal (Book 1, Chapter 9)
title: The Midnight Duel through Betrayal (Book 1, Chapter 9)
body:
The thing about betrayal is that, the circumstances don’t matter, the end results don’t matter. The social contract is broken as soon as you act on going against your word. Harry and Ron are breaking the implicit social contract they have with the fellow members of their house by acting on their selfish urges. To that point, I have a great deal of sympathy for Hermione. She understood what being in a house meant, to uphold the values and work together for the greater good. Harry and especially Ron thinking of her as an arrogant know it all and treating her with disdain must have been hard to take.

Harry’s name preceded him and he was always looked at through the lens of the actions he had no control over. He must have felt an imposter in those first few weeks at Hogwarts and Flying must have been a much needed relief for him. I’m sure it helped him feel comfortable in his own skin, to finally have something in the magical world come easy and to be lauded for his own actions.
